name: Gospels in 30 Days
description: Survey Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John in a single month with manageable daily readings.

steps.title: Birth and Beginnings
steps.notes: Genealogy, birth narratives, and the launch of Jesus' ministry.

steps.title: Kingdom Ethics (Part 1)
steps.notes: Sermon on the Mount highlights heart-level righteousness.

steps.title: Kingdom Ethics (Part 2)
steps.notes: Teaching paired with miracles that authenticate Jesus' authority.

steps.title: Mission and Opposition
steps.notes: Disciple instructions and rising resistance.

steps.title: Parables of the Kingdom
steps.notes: Stories revealing how God's reign advances.

steps.title: Revelation and Response
steps.notes: Peter's confession and teaching on community life.

steps.title: Pilgrimage to Jerusalem
steps.notes: Conversations on discipleship, marriage, and loving God.

steps.title: Final Warnings
steps.notes: Woes, prophetic teaching, and readiness parables.

steps.title: Passion and Resurrection
steps.notes: Last Supper through Great Commission.

steps.title: Mark: Urgent Beginnings
steps.notes: Jesus moves quickly from baptism to bold ministry.

steps.title: Authority over Storms
steps.notes: Parables, miracles, and feeding the five thousand.

steps.title: Tradition vs. Kingdom
steps.notes: Purity debates and the Mount of Transfiguration.

steps.title: Journey toward the Cross
steps.notes: Teachings on greatness, generosity, and love.

steps.title: Final Week in Mark
steps.notes: Apocalyptic teaching, betrayal, and resurrection.

steps.title: Luke: Birth Narratives
steps.notes: Unique details about Zechariah, Mary, and Jesus' childhood.

steps.title: Early Miracles and Mission
steps.notes: Nazareth sermon, calling disciples, and Beatitudes.

steps.title: Compassion and Authority
steps.notes: Stories of outsiders experiencing mercy.

steps.title: Resolute toward Jerusalem
steps.notes: Cost of discipleship and the sending of the seventy-two.

steps.title: Prayer and Persistence
steps.notes: Teaching on prayer, repentance, and the narrow door.

steps.title: Kingdom Values
steps.notes: Table fellowship, counting the cost, and stewardship parables.

steps.title: Grace on Display
steps.notes: Healing, gratitude, and Zacchaeus welcomed.

steps.title: Conflict and Courage
steps.notes: Temple debates and the Upper Room.

steps.title: Suffering Servant (Luke)
steps.notes: Crucifixion and Emmaus road renewal.

steps.title: John: Word Made Flesh
steps.notes: Cosmic prologue plus first signs.

steps.title: New Birth Conversations
steps.notes: Nicodemus and the Samaritan woman meet Jesus.

steps.title: Life and Authority
steps.notes: Sabbath controversies and Bread of Life discourse.

steps.title: Feasts and Opposition
steps.notes: Living water invitation and light of the world.

steps.title: Sight and Shepherding
steps.notes: Healing the blind man and Good Shepherd teaching.

steps.title: Glory Revealed
steps.notes: Raising Lazarus and triumphal entry.

steps.title: Upper Room to Resurrection
steps.notes: Farewell discourse, prayer, death, and restoration.

name: Wisdom in 21 Days
description: Blend Psalms, Proverbs, and Ecclesiastes for a three-week journey shaped around wisdom themes.

steps.title: Reverence Is the Beginning
steps.notes: Fear of the Lord framed as the starting point.

steps.title: Guard the Heart
steps.notes: Paths of wisdom contrasted with folly.

steps.title: Wisdom and Relationships
steps.notes: Lady Wisdom vs. Lady Folly imagery.

steps.title: Snapshots of Integrity
steps.notes: Couplets highlighting speech, work, and humility.

steps.title: Stewardship and Justice
steps.notes: Persistent diligence and generosity.

steps.title: Planning with Dependence
steps.notes: God directs steps; words carry weight.

steps.title: Friendship and Integrity
steps.notes: Honesty, patience, and wise counsel elevated.

steps.title: Leadership and Discernment
steps.notes: Sayings of the wise for decision-makers.

steps.title: Rare Virtues
steps.notes: Hezekiah's collection on restraint and humility.

steps.title: Courageous Wisdom
steps.notes: Justice, dependence, and the Proverbs 31 portrait.

steps.title: Psalms of Orientation
steps.notes: Blessed life, creation, and the majesty of God.

steps.title: Honest Prayer
steps.notes: Lament that still clings to God's character.

steps.title: Confidence in Crisis
steps.notes: God as refuge, shepherd, and king.

steps.title: Longing and Trust
steps.notes: Confession, guidance, and steadfast love.

steps.title: Pilgrim Songs
steps.notes: Praise rooted in covenant faithfulness.

steps.title: Ecclesiastes: The Search
steps.notes: Life under the sun feels vaporous without God.

steps.title: Contentment and Timing
steps.notes: Gifts to receive and seasons to discern.

steps.title: Wisdom in Tension
steps.notes: Enjoy God's gifts amid unanswered questions.

steps.title: Life as Gift
steps.notes: Remember your Creator while young.

steps.title: Songs of Ascents
steps.notes: Pilgrim prayers for unity, help, and hope.

steps.title: Doxology and Dependence
steps.notes: Let everything that has breath praise the Lord.

name: Acts and Epistles Primer
description: Trace the missionary movement of Acts and sample each major New Testament letter over three focused weeks.

steps.title: Spirit-Empowered Church
steps.notes: Ascension, Pentecost, and the birth of the church.

steps.title: Witness under Pressure
steps.notes: Healing at the temple gate and bold proclamation.

steps.title: Scattering and Sending
steps.notes: Deacons, Stephen's testimony, and Philip the evangelist.

steps.title: Conversion of Saul
steps.notes: Saul transformed; Peter meets Cornelius.

steps.title: Missionary Momentum
steps.notes: Antioch hub and first missionary journey.

steps.title: Grace Alone
steps.notes: Paul defends justification by faith.

steps.title: Life in the Spirit
steps.notes: Freedom expressed through love and the Spirit.

steps.title: Letters to Thessalonica
steps.notes: Encouragement for a young church awaiting Jesus.

steps.title: Hope and Perseverance
steps.notes: Clarifying the Day of the Lord and work ethic.

steps.title: Corinthian Correspondence
steps.notes: Unity, holiness, and wisdom of the cross.

steps.title: Resurrection Life
steps.notes: Gifts, love, and the triumph over death.

steps.title: New Creation Identity
steps.notes: Comfort, reconciliation, and ministry integrity.

steps.title: Generosity and Weakness
steps.notes: Grace-motivated giving and power made perfect in weakness.

steps.title: Romans Road (Part 1)
steps.notes: Human need and the gift of justification.

steps.title: Romans Road (Part 2)
steps.notes: Union with Christ and life in the Spirit.

steps.title: God's Plan for Israel and Nations
steps.notes: Mercy for Jew and Gentile alike.

steps.title: Living Sacrifice Community
steps.notes: Transformed ethics, love, and mission partnerships.

steps.title: Pastoral Priorities
steps.notes: Doctrine, discipleship, and leadership character.

steps.title: Faithful Finishing
steps.notes: Guard the gospel and fulfill your ministry.

steps.title: Grace-Filled Community
steps.notes: Sound teaching that fuels good works.

steps.title: Christ Superior
steps.notes: Jesus as final revelation, greater priest, and anchor of hope.

name: Pentateuch Foundations
description: Walk through Genesis to Deuteronomy in fifteen readings that highlight covenant moments and God's faithfulness.

steps.title: Creation and Calling
steps.notes: God's good world and humanity's fall.

steps.title: Covenant with Abraham
steps.notes: Promises of land, offspring, and blessing.

steps.title: Wrestling with God
steps.notes: Jacob's encounters and new identity.

steps.title: Providence in Egypt
steps.notes: Joseph's trials turned to rescue.

steps.title: Exodus Begins
steps.notes: Oppression, Moses' call, and God's compassion.

steps.title: Deliverance
steps.notes: Passover and Red Sea salvation.

steps.title: Law and Presence
steps.notes: Sinai covenant and Ten Commandments.

steps.title: Dwelling with God
steps.notes: Golden calf crisis and renewed covenant.

steps.title: Holiness Code
steps.notes: Day of Atonement and everyday holiness.

steps.title: Counting the Cost
steps.notes: Spies, unbelief, and wandering.

steps.title: Leadership Lessons
steps.notes: Provision, failure, and succession to Joshua.

steps.title: Renewed Generation
steps.notes: Remembering God's acts before entering the land.

steps.title: Great Commandment
steps.notes: Love the Lord with all your heart.

steps.title: Covenant Choice
steps.notes: Blessing, curse, and call to choose life.

steps.title: Transition to Joshua
steps.notes: Moses' farewell, song, and handoff.

name: Letters of John and Hope
description: Ten short readings through John's letters and key Revelation scenes for assurance and resilient discipleship.

steps.title: Word of Life
steps.notes: Fellowship grounded in the incarnate Christ.

steps.title: Walk in Light
steps.notes: Obedience, love, and warning against antichrists.

steps.title: Children of God
steps.notes: Identity rooted in God's love and purity.

steps.title: Perfecting Love
steps.notes: Discernment and confidence because God is love.

steps.title: Faith that Overcomes
steps.notes: Witness of the Spirit and assurance of eternal life.

steps.title: Walking in Truth
steps.notes: Hold to sound doctrine with hospitality and discernment.

steps.title: Co-Laborers with the Truth
steps.notes: Gaius commended, Diotrephes corrected.

steps.title: Heavenly Throne Room
steps.notes: Worthy is the Lamb who was slain.

steps.title: Persevering Witness
steps.notes: Spiritual warfare and endurance of the saints.

steps.title: New Creation Hope
steps.notes: New heaven and earth, Christ's sure return.

name: Prophets of Renewal
description: Two-week sampler through Isaiah, Jeremiah, Ezekiel, Daniel, and the Minor Prophets that highlights judgment, hope, and future restoration.

steps.title: Holy, Holy, Holy
steps.notes: Isaiah's throne room encounter fuels his prophetic call.

steps.title: Immanuel Promises
steps.notes: Light breaking into darkness through a promised child.

steps.title: Servant Songs
steps.notes: God's servant brings justice and redemption.

steps.title: New Covenant Heart
steps.notes: Law written on hearts and sins remembered no more.

steps.title: Lament and Hope
steps.notes: Great is God's steadfast love amid ruin.

steps.title: Valley of Dry Bones
steps.notes: Spirit-breathed renewal for exiles.

steps.title: Faith in Exile
steps.notes: Integrity in Babylon and God's sovereign kingdom.

steps.title: Fiery Furnace Faith
steps.notes: Courage under pressure with the fourth man present.

steps.title: Lion's Den Deliverance
steps.notes: Steadfast prayer and miraculous rescue.

steps.title: Call for Justice
steps.notes: Let justice roll down like waters.

steps.title: Hosea's Persistent Love
steps.notes: Redeeming grace for a wandering people.

steps.title: Micah's Requirements
steps.notes: Walk humbly, love mercy, do justice.

steps.title: Habakkuk's Watchtower
steps.notes: From questions to rejoicing in the Lord.

steps.title: Zechariah's Visions
steps.notes: God removes guilt and empowers by His Spirit.

name: Advent Anticipation
description: Fifteen readings that weave Old Testament promises with the Nativity narratives to cultivate hope leading up to Christmas.

steps.title: Promise in the Garden
steps.notes: Protoevangelium hints at the snake-crushing seed.

steps.title: Starry Covenant
steps.notes: Abram believes God's promise of offspring and blessing.

steps.title: Scepter from Judah
steps.notes: Royal lineage foretold in Jacob's blessing.

steps.title: A Prophet Like Moses
steps.notes: Promise of a coming mediator to hear and obey.

steps.title: A Son Forever
steps.notes: Davidic covenant guarantees an everlasting throne.

steps.title: Branch of Righteousness
steps.notes: Spirit-anointed ruler brings justice and peace.

steps.title: Light to the Nations
steps.notes: Nations stream to Zion's rising light.

steps.title: Bethlehem's Ruler
steps.notes: Small town chosen for Messiah's birth.

steps.title: Malachi's Messenger
steps.notes: Refiner prepares the way for the Lord.

steps.title: Zechariah's Song
steps.notes: Praise for redemption and a dawning sunrise.

steps.title: Mary's Magnificat
steps.notes: Humble trust in God's mercy and reversal.

steps.title: Joseph's Obedience
steps.notes: Immanuel born through courageous faith.

steps.title: Shepherds See Glory
steps.notes: Good news for the lowly on a quiet night.

steps.title: Magi Seek the King
steps.notes: Gentile worshippers guided by prophecy and star.

steps.title: Word Became Flesh
steps.notes: Grace upon grace as God dwells among us.

name: Paul's Prison Letters
description: A tight two-week journey through Ephesians, Philippians, Colossians, and Philemon to savor joy and maturity from confinement.

steps.title: Blessed in Christ
steps.notes: Spiritual blessings and praise for redemption.

steps.title: Grace Fueled Unity
steps.notes: From death to life and one new humanity.

steps.title: Mystery Revealed
steps.notes: Paul's prayer for deeper love and strength.

steps.title: Walk Worthy
steps.notes: Maintain unity, grow up into Christ, steward gifts.

steps.title: Household Discipleship
steps.notes: Imitate God, armor up, and honor relationships.

steps.title: Joy in Chains
steps.notes: Gospel progress even through imprisonment.

steps.title: Christ's Humble Mind
steps.notes: Servant-hearted unity and shining witness.

steps.title: Press On
steps.notes: Know Christ, rejoice always, practice contentment.

steps.title: Supremacy of Christ
steps.notes: Image of the invisible God reconciling all things.

steps.title: Rooted and Built Up
steps.notes: Fullness in Christ versus empty philosophies.

steps.title: Resurrection Living
steps.notes: Put on the new self and prayerful witness.

steps.title: Reconciliation on Display
steps.notes: Gospel forgiveness between brothers.

name: Psalms of Rest
description: Ten reflective readings for weary souls to rediscover refuge, gratitude, and delight in God's presence.

steps.title: Shepherd of My Soul
steps.notes: Green pastures and a cup that overflows.

steps.title: Dwelling Place
steps.notes: Teach us to number our days with wisdom.

steps.title: Safe Refuge
steps.notes: Sheltered under the Almighty's wings.

steps.title: Quieted Heart
steps.notes: Childlike trust replaces restless ambition.

steps.title: Waiting in Hope
steps.notes: Out of the depths flows confident hope in mercy.

steps.title: Still and Know
steps.notes: God is our refuge amid shaking nations.

steps.title: Grateful Remembering
steps.notes: Bless the Lord who forgives and renews.

steps.title: Joyful Strength
steps.notes: Fullness of joy in God's presence.

steps.title: Night Song
steps.notes: Hope in God even while tears flow.

steps.title: Pilgrim Peace
steps.notes: Pray for peace and rest in God's house.

name: Kingdom Parables
description: Walk through fourteen parables of Jesus that paint a vivid picture of God's upside-down kingdom.

steps.title: Seeds and Soil
steps.notes: Ask how receptive hearts respond to the word.

steps.title: Wheat and Weeds
steps.notes: Patience while the harvest ripens.

steps.title: Mustard and Leaven
steps.notes: Small beginnings with global impact.

steps.title: Hidden Treasure
steps.notes: Joyfully trading everything for the kingdom.

steps.title: Pearl of Great Price
steps.notes: Seeing unrivaled value in Christ.

steps.title: Casting the Net
steps.notes: Final sorting belongs to God.

steps.title: Forgiven Debts
steps.notes: Mercy received fuels mercy extended.

steps.title: Vineyard Workers
steps.notes: Grace upends our comparison game.

steps.title: Two Sons
steps.notes: Obedience revealed by action.

steps.title: Wedding Banquet
steps.notes: Respond to the King's invitation.

steps.title: Wise and Foolish Virgins
steps.notes: Live prepared for the Bridegroom.

steps.title: Talents and Trust
steps.notes: Faithful stewardship while the Master is away.

steps.title: Good Samaritan
steps.notes: Neighbor-love crosses every boundary.

steps.title: Prodigal Grace
steps.notes: Celebrate the Father's welcome home.

name: Life of David
description: Trace David's journey from shepherd to king, watching God's faithfulness shape imperfect leadership.

steps.title: Anointed in Secret
steps.notes: God looks at the heart.

steps.title: Facing Giants
steps.notes: Courage rooted in God's reputation.

steps.title: Friendship with Jonathan
steps.notes: Covenant friendship sustains calling.

steps.title: Saul's Pursuit
steps.notes: Prayer and dependence in exile.

steps.title: Sparing the King

steps.title: Grief and Hope
steps.notes: Lament over fallen leaders.

steps.title: King over Judah

steps.title: Ark in Jerusalem
steps.notes: Worship marked by awe.

steps.title: Covenant Promise
steps.notes: Everlasting throne established.

steps.title: Kindness to Mephibosheth
steps.notes: Grace extended to former enemies.

steps.title: Failure and Fallout
steps.notes: The cost of unchecked desire.

steps.title: Repentant Prayer
steps.notes: Create in me a clean heart.

steps.title: Family Turmoil
steps.notes: Sin fractures households.

steps.title: Absalom's Rebellion
steps.notes: Persevering when leadership is questioned.

steps.title: Restored to Jerusalem
steps.notes: Mercy shown after victory.

steps.title: Songs of Deliverance
steps.notes: Remembering God's rescues.

steps.title: Numbered Troops
steps.notes: Trust tested again.

steps.title: Charge to Solomon
steps.notes: Passing the baton well.

steps.title: Legacy Reflections
steps.notes: Declaring God's greatness to generations.

name: Spiritual Disciplines
description: Explore twelve practices that keep disciples rooted in Christ and responsive to the Spirit.

steps.title: Delighting in Scripture
steps.notes: Meditation births stability.

steps.title: Prayer that Listens
steps.notes: Speak, Lord, your servant hears.

steps.title: Fasting for Focus
steps.notes: Hidden devotion, heavenly treasure.

steps.title: Sabbath Rest
steps.notes: Stop to remember the Creator.

steps.title: Generous Giving
steps.notes: Grace motivates cheerful sharing.

steps.title: Confession and Cleansing
steps.notes: Walk in the light together.

steps.title: Service and Humility
steps.notes: Wash the feet in front of you.

steps.title: Worship in Spirit
steps.notes: Honoring God beyond geography.

steps.title: Community Fellowship
steps.notes: Shared rhythms that form the church.

steps.title: Silence and Solitude
steps.notes: Withdrawing to re-engage on mission.

steps.title: Evangelistic Witness
steps.notes: Ambassadors plead on Christ's behalf.

steps.title: Persevering Hope
steps.notes: Fix eyes on Jesus and keep running.

steps.title: Leper Made Clean

steps.title: Widow's Son Raised

steps.title: Legion Released
steps.notes: Darkness bows to Jesus' authority.

steps.title: Daughter and Woman
steps.notes: Two intertwined miracles of restoration.

steps.title: Tired But Available
steps.notes: Feeding the hungry crowd.

steps.title: Bread of Life
steps.notes: Compassion invites deeper belief.

steps.title: Blindness Exposed

steps.title: Good Shepherd

steps.title: Lazarus Raised

steps.title: Cleansing the Temple

name: Prophets of Hope
description: Sample the major prophetic promises that carried Israel through exile and point to Jesus.

steps.title: Holy Vision
steps.notes: Encountering God's glory reshapes mission.

steps.title: Immanuel Sign
steps.notes: Light dawning on people in darkness.

steps.title: Branch of Peace

steps.title: Suffering Servant
steps.notes: Wounded for our transgressions.

steps.title: New Thing

steps.title: Potter's Wheel
steps.notes: Yielding to the Master's reshaping hands.

steps.title: Lament and Hope
steps.notes: Steadfast love is new every morning.

steps.notes: Faithful proclamation despite hard hearts.

steps.title: Valley of Dry Bones
steps.notes: Spirit-breathed resurrection.

steps.title: Lion's Den Faith

steps.notes: Rebuilding and abundance promised.

name: Advent Hope
description: A 25-day journey weaving prophecies and Gospel narratives to prepare your heart for Christmas.

steps.title: Promise After the Fall
steps.notes: The first whisper of redemption.

steps.title: Stars of Promise
steps.notes: Abram believes God's covenant.

steps.notes: Royal lineage takes shape.

steps.title: Bethlehem's Ruler

name: Canonical Bible in a Year
description: Read straight through the Bible in the order most printings present it, one day at a time.

name: Chronological Year Through the Bible
description: Follow the narrative of Scripture in the order events occurred, highlighting God's unfolding story.

name: Old & New Testament 365
description: Blend Old and New Testament readings each day for a full-year journey (NT finishes early, OT continues to completion).
